definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: Getting more information about them, more can be done to conserve these cetacean .
sentences.chinese: 对鲸豚有多些了解，才能更有效地进行保育工作。

sentences.english: Ex-situ conservation is regarded as an important way to conserve and breed the plants.
sentences.chinese: 其中，迁地保护是植物保育的一种重要手段。

sentences.english: Please don't worry, you know, I am nursery teacher.
sentences.chinese: 请别担心，要知道，我是保育院的女教师。

sentences.english: Wells hopes future conservation of these animals will fully involve aboriginal cultures.
sentences.chinese: 威尔斯希望这些动物的保育将来会涵括所有土著文化。

sentences.english: Are you aware there is an old office of butterfly reserve in your village?
sentences.chinese: 请问是否知道村内有一所凤园保育区的旧办公室？

sentences.english: Please accept the gifts that we give to the nannies and children.
sentences.chinese: 敬请您们收下这些给保育员们和孩子们的礼物。

sentences.english: And a high quality childcare environment can help on that front.
sentences.chinese: 品质优良的儿童保育环境能够在这方面有帮助。

sentences.english: The TFCA Kalimantan agreement is administered by the Kehati Foundation.
sentences.chinese: 热带森林保育法加里曼丹协议由柯哈帝基金会执行。

sentences.english: The mother and twins all were doing well though the newborns were both in incubators, the official said.
sentences.chinese: 负责人称新生儿被放在在保育器内，母子都平安。

sentences.english: Infant and Child Care Practicum is a core course required by the Infant and Child Care Department of National Taipei College of Nursing (NTCN).
sentences.chinese: 是台北护理学院婴幼儿保育系相当重要的核心科目。

sentences.english: This nursery will be able to cater for 29 children…
sentences.chinese: 这家保育院能照料29个孩子。

sentences.english: The utilization of agricultural land has been in accordance with conservation and ecological environment to cope with the trend of sustainable utilization.
sentences.chinese: 农业用地符合保育利用及生态环境之永续利用趋势。

sentences.english: Successful waterfowl conservation is a model for widespread habitat protection.
sentences.chinese: 成功的保育可以用作更加广泛的生境保护模式。

sentences.english: They also proposed two funds to conserve Lut Chau and NSW respectively.
sentences.chinese: 发展商亦计划成立两个基金分别保育甩洲及南生围。

sentences.english: The summer Yan took out to bring back from the conservation park of white ball.
sentences.chinese: 夏彦拿出来从保育园带回来的白球。

sentences.english: The nurse took the children who were in her charge for a walk.
sentences.chinese: 保育员带着由她负责照料的孩子们散步。

definition: Hong Kong Wetland Park, in Yuen Long, New Territories
pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Shi1 di4 Gong1 yuan2

definition: succession (of changes in an ecological community)/naturally evolving sequence
Namaxia township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
(bird species of China) long-billed murrelet (Brachyramphus perdix)
Kouhu township in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
